alert.note: Alert for Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 06 at 2:03PM MDT until May 07 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...South Central Utah, Western Canyonlands and Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Strong crosswinds will result in difficult travel, particularly for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds may generate hazardous boating conditions over Lake Powell.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands
